home.summary: I am a software engineer in constant learning and with a solid passion for technology and programming. I consider myself a proactive person, with great work ethic and good social skills.

projects.name: WebServ
projects.summary: Creating my own HTTP web server with C++.

projects.name: Inception
projects.summary: Set up a small-medium infrastructure using Docker and Docker Compose.

projects.name: minishell
projects.summary: Recreating a shell in C using bash as a reference.

projects.name: FDF
projects.summary: Representing a landscape as a 3D object in which all surfaces are outlined in lines.

bio: Hi, I'm Miguel from Madrid, Spain. I have been coding since 2022. As a software engineer, I am most passionate about DevOps and Backend development, but I can do Frontend as well.
I started coding by myself until I got accepted on 42 Madrid, a software engineering school where I've learnt numerous specific technologies and software development fundamentals.
When I'm not at my desk, I am probably lifting weights, playing football or trying new food restaurants :]
about.education_intro: Right now I'm focused on learning cloud technologies and DevOps practices in a self-taught way.
